items.sentence: Tom had several photos of Mary hanging on his wall.
Tom handed Mary a check for half a million dollars.
Tom has lived in Boston for most of his adult life.
Tom has never told anyone what happened that night.
I would never have guessed that Tom couldn\'t swim.
A sensible person wouldn\'t speak to you like that.
How many of the words on this list don\'t you know?
It might sound like I\'m complaining, but I\'m not.
What Tom thinks happened could\'ve easily happened.
Tom didn\'t remember where he\'d left his umbrella.
